com.alvermont.terraj.stargen
Class Display

java.lang.Object
  com.alvermont.terraj.stargen.Display

public class Display
extends java.lang.Object

Display related functions. Note that most of these are not localized and are therefore likely to be of limited use in a real Java application. They may be useful for simple cases, for testing and similar purposes so I ported them over from the original C code. The HTML generation lives in the UI package as it is driven from the Swing user interface. It's template based so there is very little actual code there, most of the work is done in the templates.

Version:
$Id: Display.java,v 1.11 2006/07/06 06:58:33 martin Exp $
Author:
martin
